casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Everette HINTON. No. 449P11-12. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Charles E. Hinton, Cary, for Hinton, Charles Everette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of April 2015 by Defendant for Notice and Petition for the Chief Justice and Associate Justices to Take Judicial Notice of Adjudicative Facts and Findings by the Court:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
